001package ca.gc.cra.radar.infrastructure.poster;
002
003import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.poster.PosterOutputPort;
004import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.poster.PosterOutputPort.PosterReport;
005import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.protocol.ProtocolId;
006import java.io.IOException;
007import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
008import java.nio.file.Files;
009import java.nio.file.Path;
010import java.util.Objects;
011
012/**
013 * Writes poster reports to the filesystem using the legacy naming convention.
014 * <p>Synchronized to avoid clashing writes when multiple reports arrive concurrently.</p>
015 *
016 * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
017 */
018public final class FilePosterOutputAdapter implements PosterOutputPort {
019  private final Path outputDirectory;
020  private final ProtocolId protocol;
021  private final String extension;
022
023  /**
024   * Creates a file-backed poster output adapter.
025   *
026   * @param outputDirectory directory for rendered poster files
027   * @param protocol protocol associated with the rendered reports
028   * @throws NullPointerException if {@code outputDirectory} or {@code protocol} is {@code null}
029   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
030   */  public FilePosterOutputAdapter(Path outputDirectory, ProtocolId protocol) {
031    this.outputDirectory = Objects.requireNonNull(outputDirectory, "outputDirectory");
032    this.protocol = Objects.requireNonNull(protocol, "protocol");
033    this.extension = protocol == ProtocolId.HTTP ? ".http" : ".tn3270.txt";
034  }
035
036  /**
037   * Writes the poster report contents to a file named after the transaction id.
038   *
039   * @param report poster report to write; must not be {@code null}
040   * @throws Exception if the file cannot be created or written
041   * @implNote Names files as {@code <timestamp>_<txId>.<ext>} matching legacy tooling.
042   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
043   */  @Override
044  public synchronized void write(PosterReport report) throws Exception {
045    Objects.requireNonNull(report, "report");
046    ensureDirectory();
047    String safeId = sanitize(report.txId());
048    String fileName = report.timestampMicros() + "_" + safeId + extension;
049    Path outFile = outputDirectory.resolve(fileName);
050    Files.writeString(outFile, report.content(), StandardCharsets.UTF_8);
051  }
052
053  private void ensureDirectory() throws IOException {
054    if (!Files.exists(outputDirectory)) {
055      Files.createDirectories(outputDirectory);
056    }
057  }
058
059  private static String sanitize(String id) {
060    StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder(Math.max(16, id.length()));
061    for (int i = 0; i < id.length(); i++) {
062      char c = id.charAt(i);
063      if (Character.isLetterOrDigit(c) || c == '-' || c == '_' || c == '.') {
064        sb.append(c);
065      } else {
066        sb.append('_');
067      }
068    }
069    if (sb.length() == 0) {
070      sb.append('x');
071    }
072    return sb.toString();
073  }
074}
